description.fr:
Les {Family:68,plural:other} profitent des gains d'{%ar} des {ObjectMechanism:1607,plural:other}.
\---
Lorsqu'un {Family:68} perd son {%AR}\_:\vIl déclenche son effet de mort et construit un {ObjectMechanism:1607} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de lui.
description.en:
The {Family:68,plural:other} benefit from {ObjectMechanism:1607,plural:other}' {%ar} gains.
\---
When a {Family:68} loses their {%AR}:\vTriggers their death effect and builds one {ObjectMechanism:1607} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> them.
description.es:
Los {Family:68,plural:other} aprovechan las ganancias de {%ar} de las {ObjectMechanism:1607,plural:other}.
\---
Cuando un {Family:68} pierde su {%AR}:\vActiva su efecto de muerte y construye una {ObjectMechanism:1607} a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.de:
Die {Family:68,plural:other} erhalten zusätzliche {%ar} von {ObjectMechanism:1607,plural:other}.
\---
Wenn 1\_{Family:68} die {%AR} verliert:\vLöst seinen Todeseffekt aus und baut 1\_{ObjectMechanism:1607} im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.pt:
Os {Family:68,plural:other} aproveitam os ganhos de {%ar} das {ObjectMechanism:1607,plural:other}.
\---
Quando um {Family:68} perde sua {%AR}:\vEle aciona seu efeito de morte e constrói uma {ObjectMechanism:1607} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele.
